meanings.en: To cause something to happen or exist.

examples.en: The new policy will generate more job opportunities for everyone.
examples.zh: 新政策将为每个人创造更多的就业机会。

examples.en: Solar panels can generate electricity from sunlight effectively.
examples.zh: 太阳能电池板可以有效地从阳光中产生电力。

memoryTips.association: Think of a generator that creates power; it 'generates' energy.

words.chapter: 基本词汇 动词200 Unit 7

meanings.en: Able to change or be changed easily.
Capable of adapting to new conditions.

examples.en: A flexible schedule allows me to manage my time better.
examples.zh: 灵活的日程安排让我更好地管理时间。

examples.en: This yoga class is great for improving your flexible body.
examples.zh: 这节瑜伽课非常适合提高身体的灵活性。

memoryTips.association: Think of a flexible rubber band that can stretch and adapt to different shapes.

words.chapter: 基本词汇 形容词和副词400 Unit 9
